mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.rank, n.scientific_name, u.num_descendants FROM name_usage u JOIN name n on u.name_fk=n.id WHERE u.deleted IS NULL AND u.parent_fk is null and u.is_synonym=false and u.dataset_key=#{key, jdbcType=OTHER} ORDER BY u.rank, n.scientific_name

WITH child_query AS ( SELECT u.id, u.rank, n.scientific_name, u.num_descendants FROM name_usage u JOIN name n on u.name_fk=n.id WHERE u.deleted IS NULL AND u.parent_fk=#{key} and u.is_synonym=false ) SELECT * FROM child_query ORDER BY rank, scientific_name
